General.Name: Bharat Rasayan Limited
General.Description: Bharat Rasayan Limited manufactures and sells technical grade pesticides and intermediates in India. It offers insecticides, herbicides, fungicides, and intermediates. The company also exports its products. Bharat Rasayan Limited was incorporated in 1989 and is headquartered in New Delhi, India.

1.Name: Mr. Abhishek  Aggarwal
1.Title: Pres of Strategic Alliance & Corp. Sales

4.Name: Mr. Ajay Kumar Gupta
4.Title: Whole Time Director & Director of Operations
